Classes

struct  SAMRAI::appu::CartesianBoundaryUtilities2
 Class CartesianBoundaryUtilities2 is a utility class that simplifies the implementation of simple physical boundary data in 2 spatial dimensions. It contains routines for reading boundary data information from input files, applying those boundary conditions, and error checking boundary data. These routines apply to the case of cell-centered double data only. One may use all of these capabilities, or use the input reading, boundary setting, and error checking routines independently.
